abstract: Sen Claire McCaskill, Democrat of Missouri, reveals in blog post that breast cancer treatment is reason for her upcoming three-week absence from Congress.

headline.print_headline: Missouri: McCaskill to Undergo Cancer Treatment
headline.main: Missouri: McCaskill to Undergo Cancer Treatment

snippet: Senator Claire McCaskill, Democrat of Missouri, will be absent from Congress for the next three weeks as she undergoes treatment for breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: Senator Claire McCaskill, Democrat of Missouri, will be absent from Congress for the next three weeks as she undergoes treatment for breast cancer.
